definition: to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat

sentences.english: Industry is not alone in its abuse of animals in product testing.
sentences.chinese: 在测试产品时凌虐动物这一方面，工业是无独有偶的。

sentences.english: Howard again overpowers the Lakers to pull down 19 rebounds in addition to his 19 points.
sentences.chinese: 霍华德19分19篮板的魔鬼数据再次凌虐了湖人。

sentences.english: Child molestation is a touchy subject.
sentences.chinese: 凌虐小孩是一个敏感的话题。

sentences.english: Sexual exploitation and sexual abuse constitute serious misconduct.
sentences.chinese: 性剥削和性凌虐为严重失检行为。

sentences.english: Wait for me to find these man and woman to the dog, you see how i maltreat them.
sentences.chinese: 等我找到这对狗男女，你看我怎么凌虐他们两个。

sentences.english: Violence toward a family member, including child abuse or wife beating.
sentences.chinese: 对家庭成员施加的暴力，包罗凌虐儿童和殴打老婆。

sentences.english: Detainees are routinely subjected to severe beatings, torture and other ill-treatment .
sentences.chinese: 被监禁的人时时受到严刑苦打与凌虐。

sentences.english: Where did all the psychic abuse in the human unconscious come from?
sentences.chinese: 人类无意识当中的所有灵性凌虐是来自哪里呢？

sentences.english: Industry is not alone in its abuse of animals in product testing .
sentences.chinese: 在测试产品时凌虐动物这一方面，工业是无独有偶的。

definition: to torment/to abuse (an animal, child etc)
to ravage/to devastate/to trample on/to violate
fornication and insults/to rape and insult
the lingering death/the death of a thousand cuts (old form of capital punishment)
